name: Turn1ThiefTalk
_source: s;Thief1;Ehehe, lookie lookie!{w} The place is practically unguarded!
s;Thief2;Did they have to light the fire *before* we got started?
s;Thief1;You know that Emberson bastard -{w} he's as crazy as they come.{w}{clear}Look, all we have to do is wait for the fighting to distract everybody.{w} Then, we swoop in and nab the goods!
s;Thief2;Good plan!{w} I call dibs on the fancy spear I've heard about!
s;Thief1;What, that backscratcher?{w} If you really want.|I'm going for all the valuables I can, ehehe!
s;;Thieves <red>will never</red> interact with <light-green>player units</light-green>.|They just want to get loot, then get out!;;;hint;;;text
